name: Mother's Heaven
description:
While working on this work, what I remember is a mother figure who always does anything for me. Maybe not everyone feels what I feel. However, I want to show through this illustration that a true mother, is someone who dares to sacrifice for a child, the person who loves us the most from early on until we grow up. A mother's love lasts forever. this is "mother's heaven".

Size : 3000x4000 (px)
